data.name: Car Manufacture Demo
data.detailed_description: In Car Manufacture Demo you build your own early 20th-century automobile factory. Competition is fierce, but there might be a way to get ahead: the Indianapolis 501 race is coming. As long as you manage your resources and brand image carefully, you will be able to put together a winning team. And of course, you will need to develop a perfect racing car with your logo on it. Becoming an automobile industry legend is within your reach. Better get to work!

data.short_description: Build your own early 20th-century automobile factory.
